html.p:
Client filtering can be performed using fields from sourcetype:(software|hardware)_inventory or sourcetype:clients.
For example:
host=sys*
group=Win7
host=* os=Win*
host=* bigfix_server=bescore

table.title: Overview
table.searchTemplate: savedsearch=bigfix sourcetype=clients | search $filter$ | dedup host, bigfix_server | table host, client_id, src_ip, dns_name, user_name, os, ad_path, bigfix_server, _time

chart.title: Reports Over Time
chart.searchTemplate: savedsearch=bigfix sourcetype=clients | search $filter$ | timechart count by host

table.title: Hardware
table.searchTemplate: savedsearch=bigfix sourcetype=hardware_inventory | dedup host, property_name, bigfix_server | join host, client_id, bigfix_server [search savedsearch=bigfix sourcetype=clients] | search $filter$ | table host, property_name, property_values | sort host, property_name, bigfix_server

table.title: Software
table.searchTemplate: savedsearch=bigfix sourcetype=software_inventory NOT "--||" | dedup host, property_name, bigfix_server | join host, client_id, bigfix_server [search savedsearch=bigfix sourcetype=clients] | search $filter$ | table host, property_name, property_values, bigfix_server | sort host, property_name
